import math
testCases = int(raw_input())
caseCounter = 0
result = [[]]*testCases
while caseCounter < testCases:
    numOfPeople = int(raw_input())
    bestPosition = numOfPeople
    m = 0
    while(2**m<=bestPosition):
       # print str(bestPosition)
        m += 1
    bestPosition  = 2**(m-1)
    result[caseCounter] = bestPosition
    caseCounter +=  1
for elem in result:
    print str(elem)
